title: FS HUGE lot of 101 T205's - 100 SGC graded
author: hcv123

posts.post_title: FS HUGE lot of 101 T205's - 100 SGC graded
posts.post_content:
Just picked these up in Valley Forge.  Great start to a set.

98 of the 101 cards are SGC graded!  1 PSA graded and 2 raw/.  That's $3000 in grading fees today!!

Grade breakdown is:

4  SGC 3's
12 SGC 2.5's
18 SGC 2's
34 SGC 1.5's
28 SGC 1's
2 SGC A's
1 PSA 1.5
2 raw

Includes 7 minor leaguers and 6 variations:

Hal Chase both Ears show, frame extends
George Wiltse right ear shows
George Wiltse both ears show
Otis Crandall T crossed
Bio begins John D. Miller
Robert Harmon both ears show

Mostly commons, a couple of minor stars and off backs.

First $5499 gets it insured and delivered!  That's about $25 a card after grading fees!
